resources.string: Welcome to our Todo App! Add, Delete, Update your todos Status.
Status is either inProgress or Completed or Not Started Yet
If you want to manage your todos efficiently, Do it in this famous Todos App?
You can set the alarm remainder \n in app to notify action todo \n with phone notifications
You can add the todos \n in app by click add button action
You can delete the todos \n in app by click delete action
